text.content: Kukuku.
Looks like another victory for me
Yeah, Battler?
You have cracked open locked rooms after locked rooms, very impressive. But during the last game, you were too careless.
When I heard that the weapon was a frozen mackerel, even I couldn't believe my ears.
Or- were you trying to entertain me, so you thought of a joke?
Ahhhh I didn't notice it, very sorry about that...
Say whatever you want... As long as I don't give up, the game will still continue.
Tea time. Please enjoy the biscuits, mistress.
Next time, I will prove that magic doesn't exist...
You don't look cool saying that in that collar.
Miss, please be more elegant.
Who would believe this? She's a witch who tortures and controls human lives.
The golden witch who trapped the island of Rokkenjima inside a typhoon from Oct 4 to Oct 5, 1986, constantly striking the place with disasters, just like a game.
That golden witch is Beatrice.
That witch wants me to bow down to her.
If she can't make everyone on Rokkenjima admit that magic is real, then the witch's magic would be incomplete.
That's why, it's my job to deny the existence of magic.
I must prove that every crime can be done by humans, and end this never ending disaster, so that I can return to my home where my family is waiting for me.
To achieve all this. I am stuck in a strange place, fighting my way through a gameboard - the disasters of the island of Rokkenjima.
This battle will not end even if I keep trying to solve the riddles.
But- I can't believe you are pretty confident at this. You are even making stupid jokes.
To make your host bored is really rude.
How about- Let's have something different for the next game?
Is there anything stranger than what we have now?
For this game there will be no magic.
This is a "mystery challenge game" that doesn't involve magic.
This challenge is too simple for us. But let's play it to kill some time.
How will this benefit you at all?
Don't you understand?
You cannot blame it on magic this time.
If you can't solve the mystery, it will prove that you are just a useless fool!
This is no good. No good at all.
I told you, right? I will solve all the mysteries.
If I know from the start that there won't be any magic involved, then this will be too damn easy for me.
Rack your brains and give me your best shot.
Alright~
There are 18 people on the chessboard-
Oh, please use the red truth.
If it's coming from you, I will not trust anything other than the red truth.
Of course.
<red>Absolute truths that do no require any proofs or arguments. The "red truth" will be valid in this game as well.</red>
Please tell me... The names of those 18 people.
<red>Head of Ushiromiya family, Kinzo.</red>
<red>The oldest son, Krauss, his wife Natsuhi and their daughter Jessica.</red>
<red>The older daughter, Eva, her husband Hideyoshi and their son George.</red>
<red>The youngest son, Rudolf, his wife Kyrie and Rudolf's son Battler.</red>
<red>The youngest daughter Rosa and her daughter Maria.</red>
<red>The doctor Nanjo. The head of servants, Genji.</red>
<red>The servants: Gohda, Kumasawa, Kanon.</red>
<red>In this game, Shannon will be outside of island. Hence she will not be included.</red>
<red>She will be replaced by a girl who was lost and stumbled on Rokkenjima, Erika. A total of 18 people.</red>
So situations like Kinzo dying right from the start or Rokkenjima's witch Beatrice appearing do not exist here, right?
Both of them will not occur.
This time, magic and anything related do not exist.
Even though this looks quite similar to previous games, in reality, things are quite different...
As the beginning is different, this means that all the other "red truths" that have appeared before cannot be used.
So it's just game of mystery riddles.
Interesting. I will accept your invitation to this game.
Good. Then, it's my turn.
Purge six people on this dark and stormy night.
The Seven Stakes of Purgatory!
Your wish is my command, Beatrice-sama.
<purple>The people who died are Kinzo-san, Krauss-san, Genji-san, Gohda-san, Kumasawa-san and Kanon-san. A total of six people</purple>, correct?
How- Could this happen?
Kanon-kun! Kanon-kun!!
Father... Dear... Why...?
Good.
Since there's a large variety of chemicals laying around, we can do some proper forensic invesigations.
You guys are very lucky.
Because this tragic event happened when this detective is here...
No. This tragic event only happened because "there's a detective nearby".
I came here to Rokkenjima island, just to meet up with my cousins whom I haven't seen for years...
But nothing happened this morning... Why?
Suddenly, rainstorms and gusts stormed the area.
Rokkenjima. A 10km long island owned by the wealthy Ushiromiya family.
We visited this island just for our annual family meeting.
A horrifying disaster lurks, awaiting our arrival-
Amongst the 18 people on the island, thoughts about murder lingers around a certain person.
I suspected nothing.
It's raining.
True. The weather was great this morning.
Grrr... Maria's rose.
As an old proverb goes, the weather near the ocean is always changing.
That should probably be the mountains, right?
Hey, this is coming from my experience, someone who lives on an island.
That's not all.
Right now massive slowspeed typhoons...
Please be aware of the huge waves due to the strong gusts in the area.
<purple>We cannot leave the island before the wind and rain stops</purple>, right?
What a shame, George-aniki.
You took so much effort to get here, yet Shannon-chan is not present.
No-no, I'm just...
Shannon-chan?
Don't you remember? She is a servant, just like Kanon.
You haven't seen her for six years, right?
Just make a trip to Nii-jima right now.
How are those two things related?
Anyways, Maria.
If you're worried about your rose, why not go to the garden and take a look afterwards?
Woah, I wanna go!
Even though they haven't seen each other for six years, they are still very close.
It will be awesome if us cousins can talk to each other like that.
Compared to this...
Anyways, brother. It's finally time for our annual family meeting. How's dad?
Father has locked himself in the reading room.
He is intoxicated with that dark magic thing, he won't step out of the room.
Ara.
I say it's not a "won't step out".
He "can't step out", right?
You sound like you wish father was dead, Eva.
That's you, brother.
News about you failing your businesses have reached my ears.
We can just ask father about the distribution of his assets.
But it's difficult for me to approach him these days.
Even though I knew that father is facing some tough times.
But they are arguing amongst themselves right in from of the kids.
You look like you can't stand this anymore.
What is this family meeting? I'm here just to hang out with everyone.
I hate this too...
It will be fine, we are a family after all.
No matter how we argue, we just have to wait for the typhoon to stop. And when the seagull cries, everything will calm down.
...It will be great if that's true.
Krauss-sama
*whisper* *whisper* *whisper*
Father is finally coming out?
No. It seems like someone has fallen off a ship in the typhoon.
A girl has drifted onto the island.
Poor kid.
The doctor is patching her up. Her life is not in danger.
Seems like she managed to get here, the main house on her own.
Natsuhi and I will pay her a visit on the behalf on the family.
Let's talk about this after dinner.
Hey, everyone,
would you like some tea?
But.. what a poor kid. Ships cannot reach here in this weather.
She will be stuck on this island until tomorrow.
At this point, it will be great if nothing happens to any of us.
This rainstorm reminds me of the time when Battler was almost frightened to death screaming "The witch is here, I'm scared!".
Dad, when the heck did that happen?
Oh. I remember... That was the legend of Rokkenjima's witch.
When I was a kid, I was always told that the Golden Witch who supported the Ushiromia family will kidnap children during nights when there are typhoons.
Witches - such ridiculous things do not exist at all
uuuu- Witches do exist.
It's real.
Those are just rumours, right?
No way! Witches are real!
Maria, calm down and listen...
uu-!!
Witches are real! uu!! uu!!
Beatrice exists.
Maria is calm!!
I told you not to...
The knocking on the door silenced the whole room.
Everyone has their eyes fixed on the door.
It feels like there's something horrifying on the other side of the door.
Someone with an unclear identity, just like-
a witch.
My name is Erika Furudo.
<purple>It's hard to imagine the chef dining with the master.</purple>
<purple>I knew it. There's indeed someone else in the room apart from victims.</purple>
<purple> And that person is a woman.</purple> Lots of evidence pointing to that.
This whole thing doesn't feel real to me. It's not because the victims are normal people with normal lives. It's not because the whole thing is weird either.
This girl is too weird. Because of her, I became numb to this whole thing.
Her elegant feel has completely vanished.
This is her true form, huh...
A witch who feels happy when someone dies.
<purple>The master key was taken away.</purple>
Judging by the condition of the corpse... Doctor Nanjo.
<purple>These sacrifices died instantly, right?</purple>
Yes... as you all can see here.
<purple> Even if someone else examined the bodies, no one will make a mistake.</purple>
You're lying!
Kanon-kun... Kanon-kun was...
<purple>Kanon-san was already dead.</purple>
You are so full of yourself, acting like you own the place.
Who the hell do you think you are?
I'm a detective.
I have the right to gather evidence at the crime scene.
This guy... She is obsessed with-
These kinds of things...
It looks exactly like... A parent whose child is about to perform a play on the stage.
Standing next to the stage, smiling...
Jessica-chan, calm down!
Sorry, Erika-san, it's a bit messed up right now, can you leave us alone?
The suspect who gets in the detective's way during the inspection of the crime scene is the killer. This situation only appears in lousy detective fictions.
But this is exactly what I am thinking right now.
Erika-san!
I am very sorry! But we are all confused and messed up right now!
What we can do is not to disrupt the scene before the police arrives.
Okay then.
Battler is right.
Let's head back to the main room and contact the police.
Natsuhi-neesan, please hold onto me.
I have finished my investigation. I've got what I wanted.
So that's it. This is what happened during day one.
You know who is the murderer, Battler?
Not red... Not blue either... What's that "Purple logic" thing?
For this game, we are only guessing who is the murderer.
I don't plan on involving blue or red battles.
I only ask for one thing: Who did it?
Purple statements is to make things simple, the rule is only applicable for this round.
Well, you just need to know that this is an important statement.
Red truth is the absolute truth that does not require any additional explanation from the witch.
On the opposite side, blue truth is to deny the witch, and to determine that crimes are committed by human.
If she can't use red truth to reject my blue truth, then it will be Beatrice's loss.
On the other hand, if I fail to discover any blue truth, then I will lose.
We have been fighting like this since the very beginning.
Indeed, this time we can know that the murderer is human, so blue truth will not be necessary.
Can I say that purple statement is the same thing as red truth?
Yup! You can say that the purple statement shares the same power with red truth.
But. Only one exception.
The murderer can use purple statement to lie.
I see.
So that means those who are not the murderer cannot lie, right?
That's awesome
I see.
I didn't expect you to give up your witch advantage, you seemed so relaxed.
Ohoho, I told you before.
This is a test for you.
That's not right, it's the opposite, Beatrice
This is a test for you as well.
This time, let me show you that you are nothing without magic.
Ohohoho... Ahahaha.
Good one!
That's my lifelong rival!
Come over and challenge me, Battler!
